title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 3011/79 of 20 December 1979 fixing the coefficients for calculating levies on derived poultrymeat products and repealing Regulation No 199/67/EEC
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 3011/79  of 20 December 1979  fixing the coefficients for calculating levies on derived poultrymeat products and repealing Regulation No 199/67/EEC
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The coefficients expressing the ratio mentioned in Article 5 (1) of Regulation (EEC) No 2777/75 are those fixed in the Annex hereto.
The denominations employed in this Regulation to designate the different forms in which slaughtered poultry are put up for sale shall correspond to those given in Regulation (EEC) No 2778/75.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 January 1980.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 20 December 1979.
For the Commission
Finn GUNDELACH
Vice-President  (1)OJ No L 282, 1.11.1975, p. 77. (2)OJ No L 45, 21.2.1976, p. 3. (3)OJ No L 282, 1.11.1975, p. 84. (4)OJ No L 271, 22.10.1977, p. 1. (5)OJ No 134, 30.6.1967, p. 2831/67. (6)OJ No L 324, 18.11.1978, p. 25. (7)OJ No L 329, 24.12.1979, p. 16.
